LongName: Matrix Elements for the Double beta decay Experiments
Info: The MEDEX conference is dedicated to presenting different methods of nuclear matrix elements (NMEs) calculations in connection with the nuclear double beta decay processes. It brings together theorists and experimentalists. Several collaborators (Ivan, Rasti, Jouni) are on the organizing commitee.
One of the biggest underground physics conferences held every two years. Last time we had a parallel talk (typically given by a more senior collaborator) and a couple of posters.
Our abstract for an overview talk has been accepted, but we are looking for a speaker to present.

LongName: XIV International Conference on New Frontiers in Physics
Info: One or two highlight talks on the results of your collaboration, with a duration of 25+5 minutes. Overview talks on key subjects from every working group on physics, software, trigger/DAQ, and detectors, with a duration of 20+5 minutes, and 25+5 minutes in selected cases. One or more talks on upgrades and future plans, including one review of 25+5 minutes, and others with a duration of 20+5 or 15+5 minutes.Topical oral presentations on specific topics that you would like to propose, with a duration of 15+5 minutes, and 20+5 minutes in selected cases.
